news.title: Europe hits back at 'pure tariff chaos' from the U.S., warning trade deals are at risk
news.summary: European officials have reacted with disbelief to President Donald Trump's latest tariff policy. European officials have warned that trade deals could be at risk under the new policy.

news.title: Airlines halt Puerto Vallarta flights after violence following Mexican cartel leader's killing
news.summary: U.S. and Canadian airlines halt flights to Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, as well as some to Guadalajara, Mexico.

news.title: Eli Lilly launches new form of obesity drug Zepbound with a month’s worth of doses in one pen
news.summary: Eli Lilly hopes the device can be more convenient for Zepbound users. The company hopes it will lead to more people taking the drug.

news.title: OpenAI lands multi-year deals with consulting giants in enterprise push
news.summary: The consulting firms will help OpenAI's enterprise customers get AI agents into real production workflows more quickly. The consulting firms include Google, IBM, Microsoft, and others.

news.title: Google spinout Aalyria valued at $1.3 billion as investors pour into space-based communications
news.summary: Aalyria raised $100 million in a funding round led by Battery Ventures. Aalyria, which was spun out of Google in 2022, raised the money.

news.title: There’s another AI-doom post doing the rounds. This time, the S&P 500 dives nearly 40%.
news.summary: A booming AI economy may be very bad for the broader economy, according to Citrini Research. A booming AI industry could have a negative impact on the rest of the economy.

news.title: Fed’s Waller says next jobs report, not Supreme Court ruling, will be key for March interest rate decision
news.summary: The February jobs report, and not the Supreme Court ruling overturning a large part of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on imported goods, will be key to whether the Federal Reserve needs to cut interest rates in March.

news.title: Congress must enact Trump’s tariffs now to steer the U.S. away from a massive revenue cliff
news.summary: Tariffs need to become law or the federal budget will take a hit. Lawmakers have less than 150 days to decide on the issue.

news.title: Snowstorm hits airline stocks as total flight cancellations top 5,300
news.summary: Airline stocks are taking a hit as a major Northeast snowstorm is leading to thousands of flight cancellations. Airline stock prices are down as a result.

news.title: Why Honeywell just shaved about $600 million off the price of a chemicals acquisition
news.summary: Honeywell International received a 26% discount on its deal to acquire a business tied to the struggling chemicals industry. Honeywell International on Monday received a deal to buy a chemicals company at a discount.
